markdownPost.content:
--- id: faq-build title: Babel, JSX, and Build Steps permalink: docs/faq-build.html layout: docs category: FAQ --- ### Do I need to use JSX with React? {#do-i-need-to-use-jsx-with-react} No! Check out ["React Without JSX"](/docs/react-without-jsx.html) to learn more. ### Do I need to use ES6 (+) with React? {#do-i-need-to-use-es6--with-react} No! Check out ["React Without ES6"](/docs/react-without-es6.html) to learn more. ### How can I write comments in JSX? {#how-can-i-write-comments-in-jsx} ```jsx
{/* Comment goes here */} Hello, {name}!
``` ```jsx
{/* It also works for multi-line comments. */} Hello, {name}!
```
